tasks.execution_prompt: Create a new Python project structure with src/, tests/, and README.md. Include a basic .gitignore file for Python projects.
Add a requirements.txt with pytest, black, ruff, and mypy as development dependencies
Write a simple calculator module in src/calculator.py with add, subtract, multiply, and divide functions. Include proper type hints and docstrings.
Write comprehensive pytest tests for the calculator module in tests/test_calculator.py. Include edge cases and error handling tests.
Run black and ruff to format and lint all Python files. Fix any issues found.
